title: PLOS Variability in Regularity: Mining Temporal Mobility Patterns in London, Singapore and Beijing Using Smart-Card Data | PLOS One
summary: This post explores spatiotemporal regularity in human trajectories by mining temporal mobility patterns from smart-card data, mobile phone data, and trip survey data in various cities.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the post discusses "spatiotemporal regularity" and explicitly mentions "trip survey data" and other forms of "data" (smart-card, mobile phone), making it relevant to "Spatio Temporal", "Contextual dataset", and "Survey data".
